import React, { Fragment, useState} from 'react' export const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '' }); const {name, email, password, password2} = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, name: e.target.value }) return (

Sign Up

onChange(e)} required />
This site uses Gravatar so if you want a profile image, use a Gravatar email

Already have an account? Sign In

) }; export default Register;
